room_title: Escape room "The Second Floor" by No Way Out in St. Louis
review: Went for a friend's birthday it was great. the staff was awesome. and the puzzle was hard but we got out. lol

room_title: Escape room "The Second Floor" by No Way Out in St. Louis
review: We have done many escape rooms and this one did not disappoint. The room was spacious and had a variety of puzzles. The game master was very personable and added to the great experience.Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "The Second Floor" by No Way Out in St. Louis
review: This location was warm and comfortable. The game master was sociable, while not over talkative. He welcomed us as soon as he saw us pull in the driveway, welcoming us into the building and allowing us time to put our possessions away. We immediately started on our large room. I was with one other person and we got through about 75% of the way through the room. This room was definitely one of the most challenging, considering we've done almost 40 escape rooms, so I would not recommend this room to a new escape artist.
